description.textDescription: Your drones fire faster, have less cooldowns, shoot missiles, and gain a bonus chaingun.
description.advancedDescription: Gain Col. Droneman. Drones gain +50% (+50% per stack) attack speed and cooldown reduction. Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage. Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.
